meanings.definition: A form of a word that refers to more than one person or thing.
meanings.sent1: In English class, we learned how to form plurals of nouns.
meanings.sent2: The book explained the rules for creating plurals in different languages.
meanings.sent3: The army of ants marched in perfect plurals towards the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The forest echoed with the chirping of plurals of birds.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were filled with plurals of books waiting to be read.
